channel.title: Links on Sonia Hamilton - Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Links on Sonia Hamilton - Blog

item.title: MSSQL Resources
item.description:
MSSQL Resources

Web Sites

  • SQL Server Central, especially the links section
  • SQL Junkies. Good article on Troubleshooting Endpoints
  • SQL Skills.com (Kimberley Tripp) – especially the Resources section – whitepapers, articles, etc

User Groups

  • SQL Down Under
  • Australian SQL Server User Group – especially the Resources section
  • Sydney .NET Users Group
  • sql@informare.com.au (email list)

Podcasts/Webcasts

  • .NET Rocks
  • dnrTV
  • microsoft.com
  • PASS Webcasts
  • SearchSQLServer.com Webcasts

Useful addins

  • AnkhSVN – Subversion source code control plugin for Visual Studio
  • Log PI and Log Explorer – both allow manipulation of SQL Server logs eg remove a single transaction
  • PromptSQL – provides SQL Intellisense style word completion for various Microsoft SQL editors, and UltraEdit
  • ReSharper – features such as intelligent coding assistance, on-the-fly error highlighting and quick error correction, support for code refactoring
  • Reflector – allows you to view, navigate, search, decompile and analyze .NET assemblies. Other tools also on the same site.
  • Quest Spotlight – “Spotlight on SQL Server Enterprise provides an agent-less easy-to-use database issue discovery solution that enables you to identify and resolve SQL Server performance problems within your SQL Server environment.“

XML Tools

  • xsd, xslt, etc tools in MS Visual Studio 2005
  • oXygen XML editor
  • Altova xmlspy
  • tools in UltraEdit

Blogs

  • CLR Integration
  • SQL Server Engine Tips
  • Microsoft SQL Server Development Customer Advisory Team
  • SQL Protocols
  • SQL Server Relational Engine Manageability Team Blog
  • Tips, Tricks, and Advice from the SQL Server Query Optimization Team
  • Ian Jose’s WebLog
  • Slava Oks’s WebLog
  • Ken Henderson’s WebLog
  • Engine Watch
  • Mandar’s WebLog
